{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-10-05T12:54:06.000Z", "description": "

Title: Data Scientist

Location: Dallas, TX or Atlanta, GA (Post Covid)-remote for now

Type: Contract & Fulltime


Job Description:


1.\tA data scientist for the ML program of AIOps, which uses the FB Prophet forecasting algorithm.

2.\tThe staff will be involved in analysis of time series data, root cause analysis of anomaly data, maintenance and enhancement of the forecasting techniques as well.

3.\tAs Prophet is not a typical anomaly detection model, this isn\u2019t giving us the insightful recommendations we need to avoid/ minimize outages- so the expectation is also to be able to propose alternate / improved techniques during the course of regular implementation so that this helps to strengthen our footprint on this track


Interested please share your updated resume to kishore@kbs-s.com


Best Regards

Kishore
